tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had ankle sprain and based on practo feedback and my feasibility I consulted Dr senthilvelan .he explained in detail why this injury and applied bandage to my injured leg .doctor was very friendly and answering almost every question. My leg pain also healing fastly thanks to practo.

Dr Senthilvelan was very through in the examination of shoulder and diagnosed my shoulder labral tear on MRI scan.He gave a thorough explanation of the problem. The process of consultation put me at ease.I'm planning to have arthroscopic surgery under him.I would definitely recommend him for Ortho problems.

Very approachable doctor. I underwent Key hole shoulder surgery under his care 3 months ago and I can say I'm very happy with the outcome. He goes to great lengths to allay fears of  the surgery. I had gone to multiple corporate hospitals before having surgery under him and I can definitely say having surgery under him has been a good decision. Would definitely recommend him to others.

I met Dr Senthilvelan in his clinic and he diagnosed my Knee problem within 10 minutes of consultation .He went through my scans and clearly explained the need for keyhole surgery and put me at ease with his explanations. I underwent keyhole arthroscopic surgery for my knee ACL ligament and he did an excellent job .Now I'm 5 months post surgery and I'm back to what I love, Running marathons. I can't thank him enough and would recommend him definitely to others for any sort of knee problems.

I would not recommend this doctor nor MIOT hospitals *** ** *** ******* ********** **** ****** ** ********* ** ****** * 
They did not wait to see if patient is medically stable and performed surgery which led to other health complications  *** *********** ************ *** ******* * ** *** **** **** ***** ** ** ***** * ***** ** ** **** ******** *** **** ***** ***** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Absolutely wonderful *** ************* ******** I came all the way from Gujarat,  then to bangalore and finally Chennai for treatment.
Doctor explained with patience  about the disease and treatment plan. he is very friendly and good..i wound recommend him.

he traveled with in 10 mins to attend only me.this is the sprit that the doc should have.patient should never wait for doc.he quite simple,genuine and very polite.I could say an experience. I had a strain in left knee.while investigating my leg he wrongly pressed the pain spot I screamed he realized it and said sorry to me.and never made tight push on it.he made the test very gently.he had found the problem in minutes and expressed the result very friendly.he made feel easy and confident.thank you DOC.I would recommend him for you all.he is kinda person you really need to meet.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Senthil Velan sir for wrist tfcc tear and DrUJ  stabilization he done it very well . He is the perfect doctor . I feel the difference of before and after surgery . He find out the pain and recovery of patients he gives ******* medicine for correct time. He is very polite and humble , simplicity kindness to patients such a god gifted doctor to me .. pls visit him
Very good experienced doctor. Very patient approach. Highly recommended. Very satisfied with the treatment........

I consulted with Dr Senthilvelan for my wrist swelling. He is very courteous and patient in his consultation. I'm planning to undergo keyhole surgery for the wrist under his care. Would definitely recommend him.
I was diagnosed with ACL injury and had Arthroscopic surgery under Dr Senthilvelan care. Excellent doctor
Dr Senthilvelan diagnosed my ankle problem i have been having for 3 years. He was very patient with his consultation and explained in detail about the problem and requirement for ankle arthroscopy.

I had treatment under him for my knee. I underwent total knee replacement and I am pleased with the treatment.Iam 2 months post surgery now and I can drive my own car and have started a new lease of life.Thanks to Dr Velan.
Very informative.Excellent communication.Had a shoulder problem and he advised MRI shoulder and subsequently treated my shoulder cuff problem. I'm happy with his consultation and treatment.
Good doctor. I underwent Shoulder keyhole surgery 2 years ago for my shoulder pain. Excellent relief. I Would definitely recommend him to others.
Excellent doctor. I had severe pain in my ankle and he advised me splint which has given me excellent relief.
Doctor took his time to explain in detail about my problem. Did not prescribe me any unnecessary investigations. Well spoken and well informed.
I underwent arthroscopic shoulder surgery under Dr senthilvelan.Iam extremely happy with the surgery and subsequent care.
He patiently explained and took time to examine me completely. Best doctor I have met. On time and excellent communication skills and he was spot on on diagnosis.
